feed.title: theausinstitute TikTok
feed.subtitle: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from theausinstitute

entry.title: Climate change induced natural disasters are driving up the cost of living, and Australians have had enough. Author of Climate of the Nation 2023 and Climate & Energy Researcher Liz Morison on this week's episode of Follow the Money, unpacking how climate
entry.content: Climate change induced natural disasters are driving up the cost of living, and Australians have had enough. Author of Climate of the Nation 2023 and Climate & Energy Researcher Liz Morison on this week's episode of Follow the Money, unpacking how climate change is weighing on Australians' minds, despite the cost of living crisis. Listen to the full episode via link in bio. #auspol #climatechange

entry.title: "We don't actually have any national climate policy." "We have targets. We have no policy to drive change." - Executive Director Richard Denniss #auspol #climatechange
entry.content: "We don't actually have any national climate policy." "We have targets. We have no policy to drive change." - Executive Director Richard Denniss #auspol #climatechange

entry.title: Australian food retailers make $1.2 billion in profit each year from household food waste. That's 1.2 billion reasons to resist systemic change. Read the full report on our website, link in bio. #auspol
entry.content: Australian food retailers make $1.2 billion in profit each year from household food waste. That's 1.2 billion reasons to resist systemic change. Read the full report on our website, link in bio. #auspol

entry.title: As the Australian Government tries to tell the UN Climate Ambition Summit in New York how much action it's taking on climate change, back home they're opening new gas & coal mines. We called it out in an open letter in the New York Times signed by over 22
entry.content: As the Australian Government tries to tell the UN Climate Ambition Summit in New York how much action it's taking on climate change, back home they're opening new gas & coal mines. We called it out in an open letter in the New York Times signed by over 220 scientists & experts, urging Australia to stop approving new fossil fuel projects. #auspol #climatechange #fyp

entry.title: "We've got climate refugees in Lismore." "We've got a fossil-fuel-funded energy crisis and cost-of-living crisis, right now." - Executive Director Richard Denniss #auspol #climatechange
entry.content: "We've got climate refugees in Lismore." "We've got a fossil-fuel-funded energy crisis and cost-of-living crisis, right now." - Executive Director Richard Denniss #auspol #climatechange
